name: The Vitruvian Robot
description: A futuristic reinterpretation of Da Vinci's Vitruvian Man, where the human figure is replaced by a sleek, humanoid robot. The robots proportions mirror those of the original drawing, symbolizing the ideal balance of mechanics and design. Its joints and limbs are intricately detailed, showcasing advanced robotics, while the perfect symmetry of the figure highlights the harmony between technology and nature.
